problem_text:
Let ϕ be the Euler totient function. Does there exist a constant a > 0 such that |Aut(G)| ⩾ ϕ(|G|)a
 a) for every finite group G?
 b) for every finite nilpotent group G?
If such a constant a exists, then a ⩽ 40/41 (J. Gonz´alez-S´anchez, A. Jaikin-Zapirain, Forum Math. Sigma, 3, Article ID e7, 11 p., electronic only (2015)). Also cf. Archive 12.77.
J. Gonz´alez-S´anchez, A. Jaikin-Zapirain
